benchmark_details.name: Bench-2-CoP (Benchmarking for EU AI Compliance)
benchmark_details.overview: Bench-2-CoP is a novel framework designed to evaluate existing AI benchmarks against the requirements set forth by the EU AI Act, focusing on systemic risks and compliance assessment.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To quantify the benchmark-regulation gap by assessing the coverage of current AI evaluation benchmarks against the EU AI Act's taxonomy of model capabilities and propensities.

data.source: A curated dataset of benchmark questions from major AI benchmarks focusing on compliance with the EU AI Act.
data.annotation: Human-annotated by experts with inter-rater reliability validation.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated as part of the evaluation of benchmark questions against the EU AI Act taxonomy.
methodology.interpretation: High scores indicate good coverage of the capabilities/propensities, while low scores highlight critical gaps.
methodology.validation: Validated against a gold standard dataset annotated by human experts.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: Addresses the regulatory compliance needs outlined in the EU AI Act.
